column4: Hi, I am having an error with ubuntu 8.04 which installed by wubi. when I boot the error is : find --set-root --ignore-floppies /ubuntu/install/boot/grub/menu.lst   Error 15: File not found
could you help me? or just copy your current menu.lst to the pastebin so I just copy it. thanks
GRUB installation failed.. just try an uninstall/reinstall of it
Could you paste your /ubuntu/install/boot/grub/menu.lst to here (or to http://paste.ubuntu.com) so i just modify it? Thanks
